textSub.name: tagline
textSub.string: Those pesky humans are dropping stuff on us!

textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: Watch out! These waters are filling up with deadly mines.\n They will explode if you swim to close!\n

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string: Hint:\n If you're careful, you can hide behind a mine\n to protect you from a predator that's chasing you.
